title: How to Catch Palkia in Pokémon Pearl

steps.title: Win against Cyrus (Team Galactic boss ) He will give you a masterball.
steps.content: Win against Cyrus (Team Galactic boss ) He will give you a masterball.

steps.title: Buy a bunch of ultra balls (30 should be enough) and a couple of quick balls.
steps.content: Buy a bunch of ultra balls (30 should be enough) and a couple of quick balls.

steps.title: Climb to the top to Spear Pillar.
steps.content: Climb to the top to Spear Pillar. Beware wild Pokémon such as Bronzong.

steps.title: Defeat Galactic Commanders Mars and Jupiter in a Double Battle with your rival.
steps.content: Defeat Galactic Commanders Mars and Jupiter in a Double Battle with your rival.

steps.title: Watch the cut scene, if you want.
steps.content: Watch the cut scene, if you want.

steps.title: Defeat Cyrus for the second time.
steps.content: Defeat Cyrus for the second time.

steps.title: Save your game before you talk to Palkia.
steps.content: Save your game before you talk to Palkia. This way, if you fail to catch it, you can start over.

steps.title: When catching, do NOT use a Masterball.
steps.content: When catching, do NOT use a Masterball. The catch rate of this Pokémon is high for legendary Pokémon. Instead weaken with an attack and then chuck quick balls. Because quick balls lose their effectiveness after 5 turns, switch to ultra balls. You probably won't even need the ultra balls if it takes only one hit to get Palkia down to red.

steps.title: Run north to get an Orb that powers up Palkia's attacks.
steps.content: Run north to get an Orb that powers up Palkia's attacks.
